derivation: a primitive root; (compare H7241 (רָבִיב)); also as denominative from H7233 (רְבָבָה);
outline:
1. to be or become many, be or become much, be or become great
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be or become many
      2. to be or become great
      3. to be long (of journey)
    2. (Pual) ten thousands
kjv_def: increase, be many(-ifold), be more, multiply, ten thousands.
strongs_def: properly, to cast together , i.e. increase, especially in number; to multiply by the myriad
